Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PtALF4 (Portunus trituberculatus anti-lipopolysaccharide factor isoform 4; natural AMPs; Crustaceans, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; BBS)

Literature Information.Literature: Host expression: mainly expressed in eyestalk.Activity: Recombinant fusion protein containing this peptide is active against bacteria (Liu Y et al., 2012) Gram- V. alginolyticus L59 (MIC 1.66-3.32 uM), P. aeruginosa P25 (MIC 26.57-53.14 uM), Gram+ M.luteus M2 (MIC >106.28 uM), S.aureus S7 (MIC >106.28 uM), and fungus P. pastoris GS115 (MIC 53.14-106.28 uM).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: 1 mM IPTG induced and expressed in inclusion bodies, purified and refolded for antimicrobial assays.  UPdated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Liu Y, Cui Z, Song C, Wang S, Li Q.2011
Literature Information.Title: Multiple isoforms of immune-related genes from hemocytes and eyestalk cDNA libraries of swimming crab Portunus trituberculatus
